SELECT y.id as activityId, min(a.special_price) activityAmount, a.goods_id, sum(a.limit_count) as total, g.`name` as goodName, g.goods_icon as goodsIcon, g.thumbnail_icon, g.goods_url as goodsUrl, g.price_amount, g.sale_amount, g.rebate_amount, g.rebate_rate, g.remark, g.source, IF(s.id is null ,0,1) as subscribe, c.interest_free_id, min(y.gmt_start) as activityStart, max(y.gmt_end) as activityEnd, SUM(t.cc) as volume FROM af_seckill_activity y JOIN af_seckill_activity_goods a ON y.id = a.activity_id LEFT JOIN af_goods g ON (a.goods_id = g.id) LEFT JOIN af_goods_price b ON (a.price_id = b.id) LEFT JOIN af_activity_user_sms s on s.goods_id = g.id AND s.activity_id = y.id
and s.user_id = #{userId}
and s.user_id = -1
LEFT JOIN af_scheme_goods c on g.id = c.goods_id left join (SELECT so.activity_id,so.goods_id,count(1) as cc from af_seckill_activity_order so JOIN af_order oo ON so.order_id = oo.id where oo.`status` <> 'CLOSED' and oo.is_delete = 0 and so.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY so.activity_id,so.goods_id) t on t.activity_id = a.activity_id and t.goods_id = a.goods_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND g.status = 'PUBLISH' AND y.is_delete = 0 AND g.is_delete = 0 AND b.is_delete = 0 AND b.is_sale = 'Y' AND a.type = 2 AND a.special_price > 0 AND y.`name` = #{activityName} AND y.gmt_end >= #{dateStart} AND y.gmt_start <= #{dateEnd} GROUP BY a.goods_id order by a.sort DESC

LEFT JOIN( SELECT ag.activity_id,ag.special_price,ag.type,ag.goods_id,ac.id yid ,ag.limit_count,ag.price_id FROM af_seckill_activity_goods ag JOIN af_seckill_activity ac ON ac.id = ag.activity_id WHERE ac.is_delete = 0 AND ac.gmt_pstart <= NOW() AND ac.gmt_end >= NOW() AND ac.is_disable = 0 AND ag.is_delete = 0 AND ag.type = 2 AND ag.special_price > 0 )a ON g.`id` = a.`goods_id`

LEFT JOIN af_goods_price b ON (a.price_id = b.id) AND b.is_delete = 0 AND b.is_sale = 'Y' LEFT JOIN af_scheme_goods c ON g.id = c.goods_id left join (SELECT so.activity_id,so.goods_id,count(1) as cc from af_seckill_activity_order so JOIN af_order oo ON so.order_id = oo.id where oo.`status` <> 'CLOSED' and oo.is_delete = 0 and so.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY so.activity_id,so.goods_id) t on t.activity_id = a.activity_id and t.goods_id = a.goods_id WHERE g.is_delete = 0 AND g.status = 'PUBLISH' AND ap.`is_delete` = 0 AND m.`is_delete` = 0 and ap.is_disable = 0 AND ap.page_flag = #{pageFlag} GROUP BY m.goods_id ORDER BY m.sort DESC,m.id DESC
